name: Ricoshape
description:
Ricoshape is a 2 - 4 player competitive game with a simple mechanic. You can switch between 3 shapes, the shape you fire will depend on the shape you currently are. You can only be killed if a shape that hits you is the same as you. You are immune to any shapes that are not the same as you. You must dodge projectiles and collect ammo while trying to take down your opponents.

The game requires controllers to play.

Feel free to leave feedback about the game.
